name: In Place
description:
Put something in its place. Are you smart enough to pass all stage ?.

don't judge something from the first sight. if you think that it is difficult then that difficulty will befall you. and if you think that it's easy, then your thoughts will really happen. do not give up. finish what you started. try, trust yourself.

How to play :

Press Spacebar to switch to rectangle player

Press Shift to switch to square player

Goal :

You have to place the Rectangle Player to White Rectangle. And Square Player to White Square.
